attributes.action: Save our Swans On Oulton Broad
attributes.additional_details:
Save the swans Ducks and Geese
They live on the grass to roost and preen
Don’t let them die through the winter! They need to be out of the water to look after themselves
They are a protected species and in desperate need of ALL OUR HELP!!
attributes.background: Take down a fence put up by Self Appointed Port Authorities - swans cannot get out of the water to roost and preen themselves especially with winter coming up They could all die when the waters freeze over PLEASE  TAKE THE FLIMSY FENCE DOWN
